page.title: 03COMMERCIAL
page.content: As can be seen from the detailed count in only one 1kmx1km square Ross has 2 banks, 5 building societies, 2 medium sized supermarkets, 12 specialist- type food shops, 16 clothes shops,4 do it-yourself centres,the main South West Gas showroom & MEB showroom.There are 5 small restaurants & cafes,3 new- sagents,2 pubs & 3 take_away foodshops _2 fish & chips, one Indian food. Of the 21 'other shops' we can offer the visiting tourists the choice of goods from video hire to floral arrangements & old pine furniture to saddlery.Most of the premises offer flats & housing facilities 'above the shop',most used by the owners.Only the banks and show- rooms do not have this facility. It must be remembered that the block all- ocation has split the town in half and to obtain a full analysis the previous block's details should be studied.
